entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 14 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 14 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8 except low minus 13 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h except gusting to 40 along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8 except low minus 13 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023
